On another note, I also just bought it… 4. I want to make a christmas tree out of books this year. 5. Craft a life with few […]
text: 1. I want to make matilda’s chocolate cake. 2. Halloween candy choice forever: snickers. 3. Speaking of, really proud that I haven’t broken into the candy this year. On another note, I also just bought it… 4. I want to make a christmas tree out of books this year. 5. Craft a life with few choices. Decision fatigue is real and I do a lot to try and remove choices! 6. It’s simmer pot season! Apples, cranberries, oranges, cinnamon sticks, star anise, etc – throw in a big pot of water and simmer on the stove. Best ever. 7. TV things! I finished Shrinking, watched Woman of the Hour, about to start Love Is Blind. Guilty pleasure. 8. What’s for lunch? Head to the comments for all the ideas. 9. I can’t handle the daily 40 to 50 degree temp swings. How is it still almost 80 here? I am annoyed.
html:
1. I want to make matilda’s chocolate cake.

2. Halloween candy choice forever: snickers.

3. Speaking of, really proud that I haven’t broken into the candy this year. On another note, I also just bought it…

4. I want to make a christmas tree out of books this year.

5. Craft a life with few choices. Decision fatigue is real and I do a lot to try and remove choices!

6. It’s simmer pot season! Apples, cranberries, oranges, cinnamon sticks, star anise, etc – throw in a big pot of water and simmer on the stove. Best ever.

7. TV things! I finished Shrinking, watched Woman of the Hour, about to start Love Is Blind. Guilty pleasure.

8. What’s for lunch? Head to the comments for all the ideas.

9. I can’t handle the daily 40 to 50 degree temp swings. How is it still almost 80 here? I am annoyed.
